trans-unit.source: Defines an interface that proffers a free-threaded host object that allows for background threads to call directly (avoids marshalling to the UI thread.
[out] the build-succeeded event.
[out] the build-failed event.
This code is called only on the UI thread and kicks off the actual build with VB.
Returns 0 if the method was successful.
A flag indicating whether the build succeeded.
Value is <see langword="true" /> for success.
Performs functions at the end of compilation.
Returns 0 if the method was successful.
Gets a free-threaded host object that allows for background threads to call directly.
Avoids marshaling to the UI thread.
Returns the free-threaded host object.
<see langword="True" /> to set the <c>/ highentropyva</c> to indicate support of high entropy Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR); otherwise, <see langword="False" />.
Sets the <c>/highentropyva</c> value as specified.
<see langword="True" /> if the method was successful.
<see langword="True" /> to set the <c>/platform</c> value to <see langword="AnyCPU32BitPreferred" />; otherwise, <see langword="False" />.
Sets the <c>/platform</c> value to <see langword="AnyCPU32BitPreferred" />.
Returns <see langword="True" /> if the method was successful.

If the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ManagedCompiler.Prefer32Bit%2A> property is set on the project, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Hosting.IVbcHostObject5.SetPlatformWith32BitPreference%2A> changes the `/platform` value `AnyCPU` or the default platform value (`null` or "") to `AnyCPU32BitPreferred`.
trans-unit.target: Si le <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ManagedCompiler.Prefer32Bit%2A> propriété est définie sur le projet, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Hosting.IVbcHostObject5.SetPlatformWith32BitPreference%2A> modifications le `/platform` valeur `AnyCPU` ou la valeur de la plateforme par défaut (`null` ou « ») à `AnyCPU32BitPreferred`.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [/platform (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/platform.md).The `AnyCPU` `/platform` switch setting (`/platform:AnyCPU`) runs your application as a 64-bit process whenever possible, falling back to 32-bit for 32-bit-only systems.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez [/platform (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/platform.md). Le `AnyCPU` `/platform` commutateur de paramètre (`/platform:AnyCPU`) s’exécute votre application comme un processus 64 bits si possible, revenir à 32 bits pour les systèmes 32 bits uniquement.

trans-unit.source: However, running applications as 32-bit is often preferred to running them as 64-bit because 64-bit applications may consume more memory.
trans-unit.target: Toutefois, les applications en cours d’exécution en tant que 32 bits est souvent préféré pour les exécuter en tant que 64 bits, car les applications 64 bits peuvent consommer plus de mémoire.

trans-unit.source: The `AnyCPU32BitPreferred` setting is similar to `AnyCPU` except that its default action is to run applications in 32-bit mode on systems that support either 32-bit or 64-bit mode.
trans-unit.target: Le `AnyCPU32BitPreferred` paramètre est similaire à `AnyCPU` , sauf que son action par défaut consiste à exécuter des applications en mode 32 bits sur les systèmes qui prennent en charge en mode 32 bits ou 64 bits.

trans-unit.source: This setting accommodates future processors that may not have a fallback 32-bit mode.
trans-unit.target: Ce paramètre autorise les futurs processeurs qui ne disposent pas d’un mode 32 bits de secours.

trans-unit.source: The subsystem version.
Sets the subsystem version as specified.
Returns <see langword="true" /> if the method is successful.
